firstNightReminder: The Dentist chooses a player: if they don't have more strength than the Dentist, the Dentist drinks their blood. Tell the Dentist if the chosen player has a Drank Blood reminder token. Remove all Drank Blood reminder tokens.
otherNightReminder: The Dentist chooses a player: if they don't have more strength than the Dentist, the Dentist drinks their blood. Tell the Dentist if the chosen player has a Drank Blood reminder token. Remove all Drank Blood reminder tokens.
name: Dentist
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): you learn if they drank blood tonight. Then, do Bloodlust.

firstNightReminder: If the Bloodletter chooses a player, put the No Ability reminder token next to the Bloodletter, then if the chosen player's strength isn't more than the Bloodletter's, the Bloodletter drink's their blood. If the Bloodletter chose a townsfolk, put the Chosen reminder token next to the chosen player.
otherNightReminder: If the Bloodletter chooses a player, put the No Ability reminder token next to the Bloodletter, then if the chosen player's strength isn't more than the Bloodletter's, the Bloodletter drink's their blood. If the Bloodletter chose a townsfolk, put the Chosen reminder token next to the chosen player.
name: Bloodletter
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player (not yourself): do Bloodlust. If you chose a townsfolk, the first time their strength would reach 0, they gain 2 strength.

otherNightReminder: The Gym Teacher chooses 2 players: for each player chosen, if they don't have more strength than the Gym Teacher, the Gym Teacher drinks their blood. Tell the Gym Teacher the sum of the chosen players strengths.
name: Gym Teacher
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players (not yourself): for each player chosen, do Bloodlust. Then, you learn the sum of both player's strengths.

firstNightReminder: Tell the Spirit Medium the characters currently holding relics.
name: Spirit Medium
ability: You start knowing which characters began the game holding a relic. If you would learn an evil character, you instead learn a good character.

firstNightReminder: Tell the Vampire Chef how many pairs of players have the same strength.
otherNightReminder: Tell the Vampire Chef how many pairs of players have the same strength.
name: Vampire Chef
ability: Each night, you learn how many pairs of living players have the same strength.

otherNightReminder: The Priest chooses a player: if their strength isn't more than the Priest's, the Priest drinks their blood, then place the Safe from Drinking reminder token next to the chosen player.
name: Priest
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): do Bloodlust. Players can't drink blood from the chosen player for the rest of tonight. [+1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Tell the Relic Keeper how many relics are being held by evil players or the player with the Hoarder reminder token.
otherNightReminder: Tell the Relic Keeper how many relics are being held by evil players or the player with the Hoarder reminder token.
name: Relic Keeper
ability: Each night, you learn how many relics are held by evil players. One good player registerâ€™s falsely as evil to you.

firstNightReminder: The Red Heart chooses a player: if their strength isn't more than  the Red Heart's, the Red Heart drinks their blood. The Red Heart chooses a whole number: decrease their strength by the chosen number and increase the chosen player's strength by the same amount.
otherNightReminder: The Red Heart chooses a player: if their strength isn't more than  the Red Heart's, the Red Heart drinks their blood. The Red Heart chooses a whole number: decrease their strength by the chosen number and increase the chosen player's strength by the same amount.
name: Red Heart
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): do Bloodlust. Then, you may transfer as much strength as you want to the chosen player.

firstNightReminder: If the Bloodline chooses a player whose strength isn't more than the Bloodline's, the Bloodline drinks their blood: if they do put a Can Drink reminder token next to the chosen player.
otherNightReminder: If the Bloodline chooses a player whose strength isn't more than the Bloodline's, the Bloodline drinks their blood: if they do put a Can Drink reminder token next to the chosen player.
name: Bloodline
ability: Each night, you may choose a player: do Bloodlust. Players can't drink your blood unless you already drank their blood.

firstNightReminder: If the Physician chooses a player, place the No Ability reminder token next to the Physician, then if the chosen player's strength isn't more than the Physician's, the Physician drinks their blood. If the Physician chose a Townsfolk, set that Townsfolk's strength to 6.
otherNightReminder: If the Physician chooses a player, place the No Ability reminder token next to the Physician, then if the chosen player's strength isn't more than the Physician's, the Physician drinks their blood. If the Physician chose a Townsfolk, set that Townsfolk's strength to 6.
name: Physician
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player (not yourself): do Bloodlust. Then, if you chose a townsfolk, their strength becomes 6.

name: Blue Blood
ability: The first Townsfolk to drink your blood is immediately executed tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: If the Graverobber chooses a dead player, put the No Ability reminder token next to the Graverobber. If the chosen player is Vampire-Spawn, the Graverobbber dies. Otherwise, give the Graverobber all relics the chosen dead player had. Tell the Graverobber what relics they received. Put the Graverobber to sleep.
name: Graverobber
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: If you choose a Vampire-Spawn, you die, otherwise, you learn and gain all relics they have.

name: Van Helsing
ability: If you have a relic, you may destroy it during the day to publicly choose a player. If it was a true relic and the chosen player is the Demon, they are immediately executed.

otherNightReminder: The Thrall chooses a player: If the chosen player is the Demon, the Thrall becomes evil, otherwise, if the chosen player's strength isn't more than the Thrall's, the Thrall drinks their blood.
name: Thrall
ability: Each night*, choose a living player: If you choose the Demon, you become evil, otherwise, do Bloodlust.

name: Leper
ability: If a townsfolk drinks your blood, they are drunk until dusk. If you are mad that you are an outsider, a townsfolk might become a leper.

name: Haemophiliac
ability: You start with 2 strength.

name: Iconoclast
ability: Relics you receive are destroyed.

otherNightReminder: The Pickpocket chooses a player: If the chosen player's strength isn't more than 2 above the Pickpocket's Strength, tell the PickPocket which relics the chosen player has. The Pickpocket chooses one of them. Give the chosen relic to the Pickpocket.
name: Pickpocket
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if their strength is no more than 2 above yours, you may steal 1 of their relics of your choice.

otherNightReminder: The Blood Sacrificer chooses a player: if their strength isn't more than than Blood Sacrificer's, the Blood Sacrificer drinks their blood: if they do, they gain 1 strength. If the Blood Sacrificer's strength is at least 4 above the chosen player's strength, the chosen player dies.
name: Blood Sacrificer
ability: Each night*, choose a player: do Bloodlust. If you do, you gain 1 strength. Then, if your strength is at least 4 above the player you chose, they die.

otherNightReminder: If the Blood Leech chooses a player, the Blood Leech drinks their blood, but instead of the chosen players player losing 1 strength, they swap strengths with the Blood Leech.
name: Blood Leech
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: you switch strengths with them. You register as having drank blood tonight.

firstNightReminder: The Rabid bat chooses a player: if their strength isn't more than the Rabid Bat's, the Rabid Bat drink's their blood: if they do, the chosen player is poisoned until dusk.
otherNightReminder: The Rabid bat chooses a player: if their strength isn't more than the Rabid Bat's, the Rabid Bat drink's their blood: if they do, the chosen player is poisoned until dusk.
name: Rabid Bat
ability: Each night, choose a player: do Bloodlust. If you do, that player is poisoned until dusk. [+1 or -1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Run this ability twice. If the Vampire-Spawn is dead, they choose a living player: If they have a true relic, the Vampire-Spawn loses their ability, otherwise they drink the chosen player's blood.
name: Vampire-Spawn
ability: 2 times per night*, while dead, choose a living player: if they have a true relic, you lose your ability, otherwise, you drink their blood. [Canâ€™t start in play]

otherNightReminder: Run this ability 3 times. The Vampire chooses a living player. If the chosen player has a true relic, the Vampire loses 1 strength. Otherwise, the Vampire drinks the chosen player's blood and gains 1 strength: Place a Marked reminder token next to the chosen player.
name: Vampire
ability: 3 times per night*, choose a living player: If they have a true relic, you lose 1 strength, otherwise, you drink their blood: if you do, mark them and gain 1 strength. Marked players that die at night become an evil Vampire-Spawn. Each dawn, you lose strength equal to [1 + your true relics].

name: Anti-Vampire
ability: You register as having 2 less strength to good abilities. If a player drinks blood from you, they gain 1 strength. Each dawn, you gain strength equal to 1 + the number of true relics you hold. If you are executed or reach 10 strength, you win.

otherNightReminder: The Mosquito chooses a player: if their strength isn't more than the Mosquito's, the Mosquito drinks their blood: if they do, put a Malaria token next to the chosen player.
name: Mosquito
ability: Each night*, choose a player: do Bloodlust. If you do, that player gains Malaria. Players with Malaria lose 1 strength after dawn. Players that would drink your blood don't. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Tyrant chooses a player and drinks their blood 3 times.
name: Tyrant
ability: Each night*, choose a player: you drink their blood 3 times. Players that would drink your blood don't. Each day, if no one dies by execution, you win.

firstNightReminder: Give some players a true or false relic. Wake the evil team. Tell them which relics are false. Wake each living player with a relic. Tell them which relic they have. Each good loses one strength for each of their false relics.
otherNightReminder: Wake each living player with a relic. Tell them which relic they have. Each good loses one strength for each of their false relics.
name: Relics
ability: Some players start with a relic. Evil starts the game knowing all false relics. Good players with a false relic lose 1 strength each night. During the day, living players may publicly offer a certain relic to another living player, who may accept or decline. Each night, living players learn which relic they have.

firstNightReminder: Wake each living player and tell them their strength.
otherNightReminder: Wake each living player and tell them their strength.
name: Strength
ability: Each player starts with 5 strengths. You die if it gets to 0, and canâ€™t have more than 10. Each night, alive players learn their own strength.

name: Bloodlust
ability: Blood lust: You drink their blood if they have less strength. They lose 1 strength.
